title: rFactor 2
notes: Launcher works then crashes when going to game

title: rFactor 2
notes: To play this game force it to execute in 32 bit mode. To do this, you must set Steam in disconnected mode, execute it and in the launcher's settings button, mark the checkbox to force 32bit. Connect again Steam and play. The game works but without Force Feedback in Wheel (logitech g27)

title: rFactor 2
notes: desactivate track matsuka from workshop and select in video settings "force-32bit"
